note:
Fine art and creative photographer in Alaska who works mainly in film from 1/2 frame to 4X5 inch large format. Also do some writing and graphic design work.

My website is a work in progress: https://wildbergwanderer.com.

Was #ArcticVelocipedist, the madman behind Velocipedist Laboratories on the Twitters.

#Revna is still #DivaDog You can read her thoughts here, which links to her portfolio as the Diva Dog Top Dog Dog Model: https://wildbergwanderer.com/category/divadog/

name: Photographer
value: Capturing moments in time that will never exist again.

name: Personal Dog Assistant
value: I'm actually just my dog's personal assistant.

name: Alaska
value: I'm a long-time Alaskan. I spend much of my time wandering her forests and mountains.

name: Eclectic
value: I've been told that word describes me well anyway. I have a lot of energy, pursue a lot of interests, and pretty much no fear of failure (even though I do that often).
